hopobject.name: RFIDADP
hopobject.body:
The RFID adaptor is an interface between the Beaglebone Black and Texas Instrument's TRF7970ATB, (Multi-Protocol Fully Integrated 13.56-MHz RFID and NFC Transceiver) It allows users to have fully functional RFID and NFC capabilities on the BBB. The adaptor board also features four additional LEDs and a pushbutton.

The communication between the BBB and the TB is via SPI. Since SPI pins are not automatically enabled on BBB, a device tree overlay is used to configure the pins properly for SPI use.
hopobject.shortdesc: The RFID adaptor is an interface between the Beaglebone Black and Texas Instrument's TRF7970ATB, (Multi-Protocol Fully Integrated 13.56-MHz RFID and NFC Transceiver) It brings fully functional RFID and NFC capabilities to BBB.
